xs.description: Extra small input height. Use for compact forms.

sm.description: Small input height. Use for secondary inputs.

md.description: Medium input height. DEFAULT for most inputs.

lg.description: Large input height. Use for prominent inputs.

xl.description: Extra large input height. Use for marketing forms.

xs.description: Extra small horizontal padding (8px). Use for compact form inputs.

sm.description: Small horizontal padding (12px). Use for secondary form fields.

md.description: Medium horizontal padding (12px). Use for standard inputs. DEFAULT.

lg.description: Large horizontal padding (16px). Use for prominent form fields.

xl.description: Extra large horizontal padding (16px). Use for marketing forms.

borderRadius.description: Default input border radius (4px). Use for consistent alignment with buttons.

borderWidth.description: Input border width (1px). Use for subtle borders; focus ring provides emphasis.

lineHeight.description: Input line height for proper text alignment.

duration.description: Input transition duration for focus/hover states.

ringOffset.description: Focus ring offset from input border.
